column4: Hey guys,, I had installed a flash player that firefox made me get to watch a youtube video and then firefox crashed. Any site with flash crashed. I tried all the answers on the Internet.. and got nothing... Now I have a new fresh install of ubuntu and how do I download flash without firefox crashing?
visit the adobe site. itll let you select the correct version
ALright. I will try that. thanks
How do I know which version?? YUM for linux? .tar.gz ? .rpm? .deb? I have Ubuntu 9.04.. Sorry IM a new user
